headline: TTD Stock Crashes Post Q2 Earnings: Stay Invested or Make an Exit?
summary: TTD stock slides post Q2 as macro headwinds and competition remain concerns, but CTV growth and Kokai adoption offer bright spots.

headline: TTD Q2 Deep Dive: Cautious Advertiser Environment and AI Platform Shift Shape Outlook
summary: Advertising software maker The Trade Desk (NASDAQ:TTD) reported Q2 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 18.7% year on year to $694 million. The company expects next quarter’s revenue to be around $717 million, close to analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.41 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.
